title: Tim Cooked: Meta Poaches Apple's Top AI Talent

not just Apple, but Zuck's playbook for

acquisition. Just one quiet defection at

acquisition era thinking while Zuck's

like it's cold war Berlin. Peter
Levelvels also agrees that this is all

first it was open sourcing llama. This
way he thought if their model was just
as good but free to use, people wouldn't

train models. Next is poaching of the

just how wide the innovation problem is

speaking of OpenAI and the talent war,

highlights that usage costs have changed

additional premium on top of what AI

10 billion in future lease obligations

CEO Mike and Trader said when you look

center space, and Meta and OpenAI being
